inclusion.criterion: Body weight: 40 kg to 90 kg, inclusive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sputum positive for acid fast bacilli (AFB) by smear-microscopy ≥1+ on the WHO/IUALTD scale within 1 day prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Isoniazid and rifampin sensitivity, based on Hain GenoType MTBDR Plus assay performed within 7 days prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Certain laboratory values, as defined in the protocol, obtained within 30 days prior to entry
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: For HIV-positive candidates only: CD4+ cell count of > 200 cells/mm^3, determined within 7 days prior to study entry at a DAIDS approved laboratory.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: For females of reproductive potential, negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 7 days prior to entry.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Radiographic findings consistent with pulmonary TB from a chest x-ray performed within 14 days prior to entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability and willingness of study candidate or legal guardian/representative to provide informed consent.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to be hospitalized for approximately 3 weeks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to provide at least 10mL of sputum during an overnight collection prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of INH prophylaxis or any tuberculosis therapy within 7 days prior to study entry or for more than 7 cumulative days in the last 6 months, or receipt of any fluoroquinolone in the 1 month prior to entry.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Currently on anti-retroviral treatment (ART), has been on ART within 30 days, or is expected to initiate ART within 2 weeks after study entry.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known intolerance to any of the study drugs.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Resistance to rifampicin determined by GeneXpert within 7 days prior to study entry.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has been admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
